text:
Do you have the actual addon subscription for transactional emails?
<https://www.HubSpot.com/products/marketing/transactional-email>

Hi Everyone. In my custom coded email template. I’m getting this error message… “Warning 0:0 The template does not contain the module email_body, it will not work for blog/rss emails”

Question: Any ideas how would I go out about resolving this error?

Question Part 2: In the same custom code email I want to include a link “open email in browser” I’ve included this snippet `<a href="{{view_as_page_url}}"` 
but i’m getting a 404 error
